original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color>$Skill_CD(2716)@  在武將四周，召喚出10隻<color=#4cc769>先登死士</color>，攻擊附近的敵人。  <color=#4cc769>先登死士</color>屬性  <color=#FFE787>體力值：</color>$Soldier_HP(1281)@  武力值：$Soldier_Str(1281)@
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color>$Skill_CD(2716)@ Around the generals, summoned 10 <color=#4cc769>first dead soldiers</color> to attack nearby enemies. <color=#4cc769>First ascend to the dead</color> Attributes <color=#FFE787>Stamina value: </color>$Soldier_HP(1281)@ Force value:  $Soldier_Str(1281)@
